main_definition: To occur or operate by itself without manual intervention.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Without the need to manually initiate an action, usually as a result of a system or process that has been set up to perform it on its own
meanings_and_examples.example: The automatic doors opened when she approached them.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To have something happen by itself without any effort from the person involved
meanings_and_examples.example: I forgot my umbrella, but luckily it started raining automatically and I didn't get wet.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Done as a result of some underlying cause or mechanism that operates independently of conscious decision-making
meanings_and_examples.example: The traffic lights change color automatically to regulate the flow of vehicles.
